name: Rain Shower
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5 (alpha) Details Title Rain Shower Model No. LP-57 Series Game & Watch (Multi Screen) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date August 9, 1983 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Prevent laundry hung outside to dry from getting wet in the rain.

Gameplay

A boy has just finished hanging his laundry outside to dry. Suddenly it becomes cloudy and rain drops start to fall. Prevent rain drops from striking the laundry by moving the washing lines quickly to the right or left.

Controls Keyboard Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Move Ctrl or Enter Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
